---
title: "Papers"
listing:
  - id: published
    contents: "published/*/index.qmd"
    sort: "date desc"
    type: table
    categories: false
    sort-ui: [date, title, author-short-with-tooltip, journal-title]
    filter-ui: [date, title, author-short-with-tooltip, journal-title]
    fields: [date, title, author-short-with-tooltip, journal-title, image]
    field-display-names:
      date: Issued
      journal-title: Journal
      author-short-with-tooltip: Authors
      image: Graphic
    image-height: 100px
page-layout: article
format: 
  html: 
    grid: 
      sidebar-width: 500px
      body-width: 1400px
      margin-width: 300px
toc-location: right
---

<!-- Adding styling to homogenise the grids -->
<!-- As it is only short codes (and few) it doesn't need to be in a separate file for now -->

<style>
.quarto-listing table {
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  width: 100%;
}

.quarto-listing td:nth-child(1), .quarto-listing th:nth-child(1) { /* Date column */
  width: 10%;
}

.quarto-listing td:nth-child(3), .quarto-listing th:nth-child(3) { /* Authors column */
  width: 10%;
}

.quarto-listing th {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}

.quarto-listing td {
  font-size: 0.8rem;
  padding: 0.4rem 0.5rem;
}
</style>

:::{#published}
:::
